lineal-adjustable-base.pageTitle: Adjustable Bed Base - Adjustable Bed Frame - Bed Bases | Saatva
lineal-adjustable-base.pageDescription: Customize your comfort for better sleep with the Lineal adjustable bed base from Saatva. Free white glove delivery.

slider.imgAlt: Woman sitting comfortably on lineal base.
Pair of lineal bases with one flat and one adjusted

overview.title: Lineal Adjustable Base, Upper-Flex
overview.description: Adjustable head positions on both sides of the bed mean infinite customization for couples. Feet move together so you still feel like you’re on one bed. The Lineal Adjustable Base, Upper-Flex is compatible with most open bed frames or can be used on its own. No box spring or foundation is needed.

overview.title: Lineal Adjustable Base
overview.description: Find your most comfortable position with our adjustable base. It gets you in the perfect angle for effortless sleep — or for reading, working, or just relaxing in bed.

features.title: Zero-G
features.description: Feel weightless with perfectly balanced head and foot support. Just tap the preset setting.

features.title: Remote
features.description: Custom and preset settings for reading, working, watching TV, or getting restorative, pain-free sleep.

features.title: Under-bed lights
features.description: Light your path to find your slippers and your way back to bed in the middle of the night with just a tap of the remote.

features.title: Wall-hugging*
features.description: As Lineal changes position, the space between the wall and your bed stays the same, keeping bedside tables within reach.

features.title: Massage
features.description: Unwind using the full-body wave, head, or leg massage settings in three speeds for three levels of "aah".

features.title: Quiet motor
features.description: The quiet and discreet motor is housed away from sight in an interior sealed case to keep you peaceful and clutter-free.

foundation.pageTitle: Mattress Foundation - Bed Foundation - Bed Bases | Saatva
foundation.pageDescription: Make the most of your mattress with a mattress foundation that gives better support than a box spring. Handcrafted in the USA. FREE white glove delivery.

slider.imgAlt: Saatva Foundation, Mattress and Bed Frame
Saatva Foundation, Mattress and Bed Frame

saatva-hd.pageDescription: The Saatva HD (heavy duty) Mattress is the best mattress for heavy people. 180-day trial + 20-year warranty, FREE white-glove delivery & mattress removal
saatva-hd.productShortDescription: Luxury comfort for the bigger body

saatva-youth.pageTitle: Best Mattress for Kids - Saatva Youth - Mattresses | Saatva
saatva-youth.pageDescription: The Saatva Youth mattress is the best mattress for kids. It's organic, hypoallergenic, and adapts as they grow. Try it for 180 nights with FREE delivery.

saatva-latex-hybrid.pageTitle: Latex Hybrid Mattress - Saatva Latex Hybrid - Mattresses | Saatva
saatva-latex-hybrid.pageDescription: Saatva Latex Hybrid Mattress is a 100% natural, hypoallergenic, organic mattress for better, healthier sleep.180-day home trial + FREE white glove delivery
saatva-latex-hybrid.cardDescription: Pressure-free support of natural latex + bouncy feel of an innerspring

zenhaven.pageTitle: Latex Mattress - Zenhaven Talalay Latex Mattress | Saatva
zenhaven.pageDescription: Our 100% natural Zenhaven Talalay latex mattress delivers pure comfort. Try it for 180 days with FREE white glove delivery.
zenhaven.reviewsDescription: See why customers everywhere love the pure, weightless comfort of Saatva Zenhaven 100% latex mattress, with 4.9 out of 5 stars.

loom-and-leaf.pageTitle: Memory Foam Mattress - Loom & Leaf - Mattresses | Saatva
loom-and-leaf.pageDescription: The Loom & Leaf from Saatva is the best memory foam mattress for all sleep positions. Try it for 180 days with free contactless delivery.
loom-and-leaf.reviewsDescription: See why happy sleepers have rated the Saatva Loom & Leaf memory foam mattress an average of 4.9 out of 5 stars for comfort and great value.
loom-and-leaf.cardDescription: Contouring support of memory foam + cooling comfort

saatva-classic.pageTitle: Innerspring Mattress - Saatva Classic - Mattresses | Saatva
saatva-classic.pageDescription: Saatva Classic is the best innerspring mattress value anywhere. Save over 40% off MSRP & get 180-day trial with free white glove delivery and setup.
saatva-classic.reviewsDescription: The reviews speak for themselves. See why happy sleepers gave the Saatva Classic innerspring mattress an average of 4.9 out of 5 stars.
saatva-classic.cardDescription: Responsive feel of an innerspring + cushioned comfort layers

solaire.disclaimer: * Consumer Reports does not endorse products and services.
solaire.pageTitle: Adjustable Mattress - Solaire by Saatva - Mattresses | Saatva
solaire.pageDescription: Personalize your sleep comfort with the ultra-precise Solaire adjustable mattress from Saatva.180-night home trial and FREE white glove delivery included.
solaire.reviewsDescription: See why satisfied sleepers love the Saatva Solaire adjustable mattress with an average rating of 4.9 out of 5 stars!

tour.title: Organic Cotton Pillow Top
tour.description: Adds a layer of cushioning for the ultimate in comfort and support. Wrapped in a breathable organic cotton cover and finished with organic gold damask trim.

tour.title: 5-Zone Talalay Latex
tour.description: Feels buoyant and responsive. Denser 100% natural Talalay latex in the center third of the mattress forms our 5-zone back support for maximum pressure-point relief. Naturally hypoallergenic.

tour.title: Gel-Infused Memory Foam
tour.description: Contours to your body and provides spinal support while also keeping you cool. The CertiPUR-US® label means it’s free of harmful chemicals.

tour.title: Moisture Barrier Layers
tour.description: Protects internal components to prevent bacteria growth. This ensures a healthier sleep environment and a mattress that will last for years to come.

tour.title: Vulcanized Air Chambers
tour.description: Multi-directional box baffle design evenly supports your body from head to toe and edge to edge, regardless of firmness level. Experience consistent comfort at every point.

tour.title: Power Edge Enclosure
tour.description: Reinforces support around perimeter. In-rail air inflator operates quietly and invisibly, so you never have to worry about hiding pumps or hoses.

slider.imgAlt: View from the side of a Solaire mattress.
Close up of the a Solaire mattress.

the-saatva-pillow.pageDescription: Hotel-quality latex pillow with superior neck and spine support. Drift into deep comfort with this cooling pillow. Free shipping & 45-day returns.

down-alternative-pillow.pageDescription: Sleep on a cloud of comfort with light, airy, hypoallergenic down alternative pillows covered in organic cotton. Try it for 45 days with free shipping.

memory-foam-pillow.pageDescription: Sleep cooler and more soundly with our graphite-infused gel memory foam pillow that draws heat away. Try it for 45 days with free shipping.

organic-percale-sheet-set.pageDescription: Sleep cooler with our crisp organic percale sheets made from the world's best cotton. FREE shipping and 45-day returns.

linen-sheet-set.pageDescription: Fair trade, all-natural Belgian linen sheets stay cool in the summer yet warm in the winter. In twin to Cal-king. FREE shipping included.
